data.title: The Message
data.meta_description: The Message is a 1976 film directed by Moustapha Akkad, produced by Moustapha Akkad, and starring Anthony Quinn, Irene Papas, Michael Ansara, Johnny Sekka, Michael Forest, André Morell, Garrick Hagon, Damien Thomas, and Martin Benson. The inspiration for this film is Muhammad ibn Abdullah...
data.text:
The Message is a 1976 film directed by Moustapha Akkad, produced by Moustapha Akkad, and starring Anthony Quinn, Irene Papas, Michael Ansara, Johnny Sekka, Michael Forest, André Morell, Garrick Hagon, Damien Thomas, and Martin Benson. The inspiration for this film is Muhammad ibn Abdullah.

Premise[]

Muhammad invites several people to accept the religion of Islam. However, uniting the several tribes of the vast region comes with several challenges.

Cast[]
